DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Study Of PF-05231023 In Obese Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male female subject nonchildbearing potential age 21 70 . Subjects BMI 30 45.4 kg/m2 total body weight > 110 lb . Recent ( 6 month ) unstable concurrent disease . History allergic disease drug allergy . Any condition affect food consumption absorption .
